special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. 
II – Each player searches their library for a legendary creature, then puts it onto the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.
III – Destroy all creatures.
